title: Landscaping Font
content:
Hi,  
I'm trying to find a font for a landscaping logo, I would really appreciate some suggestions.  
Thank you in advance for your help.
author: Anna08

comments.content:
More details please! Especially concerning what kind of customers the client has... and would like to have. Also: Do they specialize in certain kinds of landscaping? And: What do other parts of the design look like? For example, do they have a text font they like use?

hhp
Papyrus. All landscapers use Papyrus. I believe it is part of their union contract or some such thing.

They specialize in growing and placing lawn and have a variety of customers, they do football grounds to just a small front yard. So far they only specified that they like the logo to be simple and we agreed on different designs of grass, but they want the font to stand out. So that’s where I need help please.
